title: Bruce4
author: Bruce4
content: As a medical specialist,I've noticed the impact of various societal factors on the health and wellbeing and my patients everyday.Among the concerning trends I have observed,is the growing number of patients who not only suffer from poor health,but find themselves trapped in financial struggle and dependency.''Fait currency'' refers to a form of money that is not backed by a physical commodity such as gold or silver but is instead declared as legal tender by a government.When the value of money becomes uncertain,individuals are incentivized to spend rather than save.People develop a hightime preference choosing immediate consumption over long term planning and investment.This mindset leads to detrimental effect on lifestyle,personal health and wellbeing.People are more likely to make destructive decisions on themselves and engage in unhealthy behaviors as well.The consequences of this choice's manifest in a rise in several illnesses and also mental health issues which in turn leaves them with no choice but to depend on the society to care for them.Fait currency creates an environment where individuals fail to accumulate wealth and secure their financial prowess.Without the means to invest,acquire assets or start a good business,individuals are trapped in a cycle of poverty.Poverty that restricts good life,access to a quality healthCare,education and resources necessary for a personal development.Leading to a decline in overall wellbeing. Meanwhile,bitcoin is a healthier choice because it offers a path to personal empowerment and financial stability by breaking free from the grip of fait currency.it is a to give hope.It's combination with financial education and personal responsibility links to a healthy lifestyle.By embracing bitcoin,we can improve wellbeing,escape the cycle of poverty and create a more prosperous future.We can strive toward a society where individuals are not mere products of fait currency,but rather creators of their own destiny.Bitcoin is here to change our thinking and health.

comments.author: letteredhub
comments.body: How pathetic it is that in a world of over 7billion humans only a fraction of that number on earth have access to the luxuries of life. And that's because these fraction holds and control the means of production and legitimate use of force. And all of this is possible cause this fraction controls how money moves in and out of the hands of rest of us, and when anyone is capable of having control over how the circulation of money should go around they indirectly also controls how the people live.And it's this lack of control by any authority on bitcoin that makes the digital asset to seem like a threat that has come to liberate people from fiat regulations to financial self determination. Putting everyone in charge and control of their money without intermediary. With BTC the idea to plan on how to invest and be hopeful of profit has increased among many people, making them less dependent on fiat for survival. The idea that you have an investment that's capable of multiplying profit for you at anytime is enough to keep you in a good mindset and sound mind compared to a situation of no hope.

comments.author: hatshepsut93
comments.body: Quote from: Bruce4 on June 15, 2023, 08:44:36 PMFait currency creates an environment where individuals fail to accumulate wealth and secure their financial prowess.Without the means to invest,acquire assets or start a good business,individuals are trapped in a cycle of poverty.Poverty that restricts good life,access to a quality healthCare,education and resources necessary for a personal development.Leading to a decline in overall wellbeing.Fiat money system is not causing poverty, there are no people who get poor from having their savings eroded by inflation, poor people are those who have such low income that they never had any savings to begin with, they live from paycheck to paycheck and go into debt. Bitcoin is not a solution to poverty because it doesn't generate cash flow like some other assets. It just goes up and down from unpredictable speculative trading. When/if it will stabilize, it will be just a net zero against inflation, in theory. In the past people could get rich from holding Bitcoin because it was in rapid adoption phase. That phase will end at some point.
